articles.author: Emma Grimshaw
articles.title: No new Bristol coronavirus cases as UK deaths at lowest level since before lockdown - Bristol Live
articles.description: A total of 670 new Covid cases have been reported across the country
articles.content:
No new Bristol coronavirus cases have been recorded in the last 24 hours, according to figures released by Public Health England today (August 4).

articles.title: Hong Kong reports 80 new COVID-19 cases, mostly local transmissions - CNA
articles.description: Hong Kong reported 80 new coronavirus cases on Tuesday, including 75 that were locally transmitted, as authorities raced to contain a third wave of the outbreak which has seen infections soar over the past month.

articles.title: Coronavirus: Millions return to lockdown in Philippines - Yahoo Singapore News
articles.description: A strict curb on movements has been re-imposed in the capital Manila after a surge in Covid infections.
articles.content:
